entry.title: neuroborus/ethers-tools: ethers-tools is a zero-dependency lightweight JavaScript/TypeScript library built on top of ethers.js designed to simplify smart contract interactions and multicall3 aggregation on the Ethereum blockchain and compatible EVM networks.

entry.title: ethhix/GameScanner: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.
entry.content: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.

entry.title: KlautNet/ts-caldav: A lightweight and robust CalDAV client for Node.js applications, written in TypeScript. This library enables seamless integration with CalDAV servers to manage calendars, events, and tasks.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. entry.title: isaee-xyz/Json-Path-Finder: JSON Pathfinder is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps developers and data analysts work with JSON data. Instantly find paths to any property in complex JSON structures, validate your JSON, and get intelligent error feedback when there are syntax issues.
